textContent:
1 ounce Jamaican Rum
1/2 ounce Curacao
1/2 ounce orgeat
1/2 ounce lime juice
4 ounces Champagne
Garnish: mint sprig and lime wheel

Combine the lime juice, orgeat, curacao, and rum in a small container and refrigerate for an hour or two.
Pour the chilled mixture into a Collins glass, fill to the rim with ice, top with Champagne, and add the garnish.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/mai-tai-spritz
title: Mai Tai Spritz
